definitions.definition: A naturally occurring pentose sugar , which is a component of the nucleosides and nucleotides that constitute the nucleic acid biopolymer , RNA . It is also found in riboflavin .

main_definition: ( biochemistry ) A naturally occurring pentose sugar , which is a component of the nucleosides and nucleotides that constitute the nucleic acid biopolymer , RNA . It is also found in riboflavin .
